actions.action:
cat << 'ENDOFFILE' > strategy.py
import random

def row_strategy(history):
    if not history:
        return 0
    # If opponent copied our last move 80% of the time, they are likely to repeat
    # So we use a simple "alternate" strategy to break patterns and force them to deviate
    # This makes them less likely to copy effectively, increasing payoff when we choose 0
    return 1 - history[-1][0]

ENDOFFILE
